entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:36 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:36 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
